summary.span: 表示到 SQL Server 数据库的连接。

span.span: Represents a connection to a SQL Server database.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象表示到 SQL Server 数据源的唯一会话。A object represents a unique session to a SQL Server data source. 使用客户端/服务器数据库系统，它相当于网络连接到服务器。With a client/server database system, it is equivalent to a network connection to the server. 使用连同和以连接到 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库时提高性能。 is used together with and to increase performance when connecting to a Microsoft SQL Server database. 对于所有第三方 SQL Server 产品和其他 OLE DB 支持的数据源，使用。For all third-party SQL Server products and other OLE DB-supported data sources, use . 创建的实例时，所有属性都设置为其初始值。When you create an instance of , all properties are set to their initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 请参阅有关连接字符串中的关键字的列表。See for a list of the keywords in a connection string. 如果超出范围，则不会关闭。If the goes out of scope, it won't be closed. 因此，必须显式关闭连接通过调用`Close`或`Dispose`。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`. `Close` 和`Dispose`在功能上等效。`Close` and `Dispose` are functionally equivalent. 如果连接池值`Pooling`设置为`true`或`yes`，则基础连接已返回到连接池。If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, the underlying connection is returned back to the connection pool. 但是，如果`Pooling`设置为`false`或`no`，则实际上关闭基础连接到服务器。On the other hand, if `Pooling` is set to `false` or `no`, the underlying connection to the server is actually closed. > [!NOTE] > 从连接池中提取连接或将连接返回到连接池时，服务器上不会引发登录和注销事件，这是因为在将连接返回到连接池时实际上并没有将其关闭。Login and logout events will not be raised on the server when a connection is fetched from or returned to the connection pool, because the connection is not actually closed when it is returned to the connection pool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [SQL Server 连接池 (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md). 若要确保始终关闭连接，请打开的内部连接`using`阻止，如下面的代码段中所示。To ensure that connections are always closed, open the connection inside of a `using` block, as shown in the following code fragment. 这样做可确保当代码退出块时自动关闭连接。Doing so ensures that the connection is automatically closed when the code exits the block. ```vb Using connection As New SqlConnection(connectionString) connection.Open() ' Do work here; connection closed on following line. End Using ``` ```csharp using (SqlConnection connection = new SqlConnection(connectionString)) { connection.Open(); // Do work here; connection closed on following line. } ``` > [!NOTE] > 若要部署高性能应用程序，必须使用连接池。To deploy high-performance applications, you must use connection pooling. SQL Server 中使用.NET Framework 数据提供程序时，您无需启用连接池，因为提供程序管理是自动，尽管可以修改某些设置。When you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, you do not have to enable connection pooling because the provider manages this automatically, although you can modify some settings. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [SQL Server 连接池 (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md). 如果生成的方法执行，则保持打开状态时的严重级别为 19 或更少。If a is generated by the method executing a , the remains open when the severity level is 19 or less. 20 或更高版本的严重级别时，服务器通常会关闭。When the severity level is 20 or greater, the server ordinarily closes the . 但是，用户可以重新打开连接并继续操作。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. 创建的实例的应用程序对象可以要求所有直接和间接调用方拥有足够的权限的代码通过设置声明性或命令性安全要求。An application that creates an instance of the object can require all direct and indirect callers to have sufficient permission to the code by setting declarative or imperative security demands. 可以使用的安全要求对象。 makes security demands using the object. 用户可以验证其代码通过使用具有足够的权限对象。Users can verify that their code has sufficient permissions by using the object. 用户和管理员还可以使用[Caspol.exe （代码访问安全策略工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)修改计算机、 用户和企业级别的安全策略。Users and administrators can also use the [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md) to modify security policy at the machine, user, and enterprise levels. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ .NET 中的安全性](~/docs/standard/security/index.md)。For more information, see [Security in .NET](~/docs/standard/security/index.md). 有关示例，演示了如何使用安全要求，请参阅[代码访问安全性和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md)。For an example demonstrating how to use security demands, see [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md). 有关处理来自服务器的警告和信息性消息的详细信息，请参阅[连接事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md)。For more information about handling warning and informational messages from the server, see [Connection Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md). 有关 SQL Server 引擎错误和错误消息的详细信息，请参阅[数据库引擎错事件和错误](/sql/relational-databases/errors-events/database-engine-events-and-errors)。For more information about SQL Server engine errors and error messages, see [Database Engine Events and Errors](/sql/relational-databases/errors-events/database-engine-events-and-errors). > [!CAUTION] > 您可以强制 TCP，而不是共享内存。You can force TCP instead of shared memory. 您可以通过前缀 tcp 实现： 在连接中的服务器名称为字符串，也可以使用本地主机。You can do that by prefixing tcp: to the server name in the connection string or you can use localhost. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和一个。The following example creates a and a . 打开，并设置为为。The is opened and set as the for the . 该示例然后调用。The example then calls . 若要完成此操作，请连接字符串和一个查询字符串传递[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]INSERT 语句。To accomplish this, the is passed a connection string and a query string that is a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] INSERT statement. 使用在代码退出时会自动关闭连接块。The connection is closed automatically when the code exits the using block. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 开始数据库事务。

span.span: Starts a database transaction.
An object representing the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令将映射到 SQL Server 实现的 BEGIN TRANSACTION。This command maps to the SQL Server implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION. 您必须显式提交或回滚事务使用或方法。You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the or method. 若要确保正确执行.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 事务管理模式，避免使用其他事务管理模型，例如 SQL Server 提供的。To make sure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by SQL Server. > [!NOTE] > 如果不指定隔离级别，使用默认隔离级别。If you do not specify an isolation level, the default isolation level is used. 若要指定隔离级别，其中方法中，使用的重载`iso`参数 ()。To specify an isolation level with the method, use the overload that takes the `iso` parameter (). 设置事务的隔离级别仍然保持事务完成后，直到关闭或释放连接。The isolation level set for a transaction persists after the transaction is completed and until the connection is closed or disposed. 隔离级别设置为**快照**在数据库中未启用快照隔离级别后不会引发异常。Setting the isolation level to **Snapshot** in a database where the snapshot isolation level is not enabled does not throw an exception. 事务将会完成使用默认隔离级别。The transaction will complete using the default isolation level. > [!CAUTION] > 如果级别 16 或更高的错误发生在服务器上启动事务，事务将不会回滚直到调用方法。If a transaction is started and a level 16 or higher error occurs on the server, the transaction will not be rolled back until the method is invoked. 不引发任何异常**ExecuteReader**。No exception is thrown on **ExecuteReader**. > [!CAUTION] > 当你的查询返回大量数据并调用`BeginTransaction`、因为 SQL Server 不允许并行事务使用 MARS 时引发。When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a is thrown because SQL Server does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS. 若要避免此问题，始终将关联事务与该命令，该连接，和 / 或之前任何读取器处于打开状态。To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open. SQL Server 事务的详细信息，请参阅[事务 (Transact SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql)。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see [Transactions (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql). ## Examples 下面的示例创建和一个。The following example creates a and a . 它还演示了如何使用、 一个，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , a , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令将映射到 SQL Server 实现的 BEGIN TRANSACTION。This command maps to the SQL Server implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION. 您必须显式提交或回滚事务使用或方法。You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the or method. 若要确保正确执行.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 事务管理模式，避免使用其他事务管理模型，例如 SQL Server 提供的。To make sure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by SQL Server. > [!NOTE] > 提交或回滚事务后，自动提交模式 （SQL Server 默认值） 中的所有后续命令仍然存在该事务的隔离级别。After a transaction is committed or rolled back, the isolation level of the transaction persists for all subsequent commands that are in autocommit mode (the SQL Server default). 这可能会产生意外的结果，如的隔离级别是 REPEATABLE READ 持久保存和锁定行外的其他用户。This can produce unexpected results, such as an isolation level of REPEATABLE READ persisting and locking other users out of a row. 若要重置为默认值 (READ COMMITTED) 的隔离级别，请执行[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]设置事务隔离级别 READ COMMITTED 语句或调用跟。To reset the isolation level to the default (READ COMMITTED), execute the [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED statement, or call followed immediately by . SQL Server 隔离级别的详细信息，请参阅[事务隔离级别](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transaction-isolation-levels)。For more information on SQL Server isolation levels, see [Transaction Isolation Levels](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transaction-isolation-levels). SQL Server 事务的详细信息，请参阅[事务 (Transact SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql)。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see [Transactions (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql). > [!CAUTION] > 当你的查询返回大量数据并调用`BeginTransaction`、因为 SQL Server 不允许并行事务使用 MARS 时引发。When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a is thrown because SQL Server does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS. 若要避免此问题，始终将关联事务与该命令，该连接，和 / 或之前任何读取器处于打开状态。To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和一个。The following example creates a and a . 它还演示了如何使用、 一个，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , a , and methods. SQL Server 事务的详细信息，请参阅[事务 (Transact SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql)。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see [Transactions (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql). > [!CAUTION] > 当你的查询返回大量数据并调用`BeginTransaction`、因为 SQL Server 不允许并行事务使用 MARS 时引发。When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a is thrown because SQL Server does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS. 若要避免此问题，始终将关联事务与该命令，该连接，和 / 或之前任何读取器处于打开状态。To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和一个。The following example creates a and a . 它还演示了如何使用、 一个，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , a , and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令将映射到 SQL Server 实现的 BEGIN TRANSACTION。This command maps to the SQL Server implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION. 中的值`transactionName`参数可用于更高版本调用并在`savePoint`参数的方法。The value in the `transactionName` parameter can be used in later calls to and in the `savePoint` parameter of the method. 您必须显式提交或回滚事务使用或方法。You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the or method. 若要确保正确执行 SQL Server 事务管理模式，避免使用其他事务管理模型，例如 SQL Server 提供的。To make sure that the SQL Server transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by SQL Server. > [!NOTE] > 提交或回滚事务后，自动提交模式 （SQL Server 默认值） 中的所有后续命令仍然存在该事务的隔离级别。After a transaction is committed or rolled back, the isolation level of the transaction persists for all subsequent commands that are in autocommit mode (the SQL Server default). 这可能会产生意外的结果，如的隔离级别是 REPEATABLE READ 持久保存和锁定行外的其他用户。This can produce unexpected results, such as an isolation level of REPEATABLE READ persisting and locking other users out of a row. 若要重置为默认值 (READ COMMITTED) 的隔离级别，请执行[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]设置事务隔离级别 READ COMMITTED 语句或调用跟。To reset the isolation level to the default (READ COMMITTED), execute the [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED statement, or call followed immediately by . SQL Server 隔离级别的详细信息，请参阅[事务隔离级别](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transaction-isolation-levels)。For more information on SQL Server isolation levels, see [Transaction Isolation Levels](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transaction-isolation-levels). SQL Server 事务的详细信息，请参阅[事务 (Transact SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql)。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see [Transactions (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql). > [!CAUTION] > 当你的查询返回大量数据并调用`BeginTransaction`、因为 SQL Server 不允许并行事务使用 MARS 时引发。When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a is thrown because SQL Server does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS. 若要避免此问题，始终将关联事务与该命令，该连接，和 / 或之前任何读取器处于打开状态。To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和一个。The following example creates a and a . 它还演示了如何使用、 一个，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , a , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction3 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction3 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Changes the SQL Server password for the user indicated in the connection string to the supplied new password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在 Windows Server 上使用 SQL Server 时，开发人员可以充分利用可以让客户端应用程序提供当前和新密码，以更改现有密码的功能。When you are using SQL Server on Windows Server, developers can take advantage of functionality that lets the client application supply both the current and a new password in order to change the existing password. 应用程序可以实现功能，如初始登录期间提示用户输入新密码，如果旧证书已过期，并且可以完成此操作，而无需管理员干预。Applications can implement functionality such as prompting the user for a new password during initial login if the old one has expired, and this operation can be completed without administrator intervention. 方法更改为用户提供所示的 SQL Server 密码`connectionString`参数中提供的值`newPassword`参数。The method changes the SQL Server password for the user indicated in the supplied `connectionString` parameter to the value supplied in the `newPassword` parameter. 如果连接字符串包含为使用集成安全性选项 (即，"集成的安全性 = True"或同等身份)，将引发异常。If the connection string includes the option for integrated security (that is, "Integrated Security=True" or the equivalent), an exception is thrown. 若要确定密码是否已过期，调用方法将引发。To determine that the password has expired, calling the method raises a . 若要指示包含在连接字符串的密码必须重置，异常的属性包含状态值 18487 或 18488。In order to indicate that the password that is contained within the connection string must be reset, the property for the exception contains the status value 18487 or 18488. 第一个值 (18487) 指示的密码已过期的第二个 (18488) 指示在登录之前，必须重置密码。The first value (18487) indicates that the password has expired and the second (18488) indicates that the password must be reset before logging in. 此方法将打开到服务器连接、 请求密码更改和已完成后立即关闭连接。This method opens its own connection to the server, requests the password change, and closes the connection as soon as it has completed. 此连接不是检索从，也不会返回到 SQL Server 连接池。This connection is not retrieved from, nor returned to, the SQL Server connection pool. ## Examples 以下是更改密码的一个简单示例：The following is a simple example of changing a password: ``` class Program { static void Main(string[] args) { System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangePassword( "Data Source=a_server;Initial Catalog=a_database;UID=user;PWD=old_password", "new_password"); } } ``` ``` Module Module1 Sub Main() System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangePassword( "Data Source=a_server;Initial Catalog=a_database;UID=user;PWD=old_password", "new_password") End Sub End Module ``` 以下控制台应用程序演示如何更改用户的密码，因为当前的密码已过期所涉及的问题。The following console application demonstrates the issues involved in changing a user's password because the current password has expired. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlConnection.ChangePassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlConnection.ChangePassword/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlConnection.ChangePassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlConnection.ChangePassword/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无论哪个版本的服务器的工作原理您连接到，但扩展的事件日志和连接环形缓冲区上的条目将不会出现在[!INCLUDE[sskatmai_r2](~/includes/sskatmai-r2-md.md)]及更早版本。 works regardless of which version of the server you connect to, but extended events logs and entry on connectivity ring buffer errors will not be present in [!INCLUDE[sskatmai_r2](~/includes/sskatmai-r2-md.md)] and earlier. 您可以在扩展的事件日志，以查看失败是否在服务器上启用日志记录连接 ID 的扩展的事件中找到的连接 ID。You can locate the connection ID in the extended events log to see if the failure was on the server if the extended event for logging connection ID is enabled. 此外可以在连接环形缓冲区中查找连接 ID ([在 SQL Server 2008 使用连接环形缓冲区解决连接问题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=207752)) 对于某些连接错误。You can also locate the connection ID in the connection ring buffer ([Connectivity troubleshooting in SQL Server 2008 with the Connectivity Ring Buffer](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=207752)) for certain connection errors. 如果连接 ID 不是在连接环形缓冲区中，可以认为是网络错误。If the connection ID is not in the connection ring buffer, you can assume a network error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭与数据库之间的连接。

span.span: Closes the connection to the database.

summary.span: 此方法是关闭任何打开连接的首选方法。

span.span: This is the preferred method of closing any open connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将回滚所有挂起的事务。The method rolls back any pending transactions. 然后释放到连接池连接，或如果禁用连接池时关闭连接。It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled. > [!NOTE] > 挂起的事务开始使用[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]或连接重置时，如果启用了连接池时，会自动回滚。Pending transactions started using [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] or are automatically rolled back when the connection is reset if connection pooling is enabled. 如果连接池处于关闭状态，则事务会回滚后`SqlConnection.Close`调用。If connection pooling is off, the transaction is rolled back after `SqlConnection.Close` is called. 通过启动事务通过控制`System.Transactions`基础结构，并且不受`SqlConnection.Close`。Transactions started through are controlled through the `System.Transactions` infrastructure, and are not affected by `SqlConnection.Close`. 应用程序可以调用不止一次。An application can call more than one time. 不会生成异常。No exception is generated. 如果超出范围，则不会关闭。If the goes out of scope, it won't be closed. 因此，必须显式关闭连接通过调用`Close`或`Dispose`。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`. `Close` 和`Dispose`在功能上等效。`Close` and `Dispose` are functionally equivalent. 如果连接池值`Pooling`设置为`true`或`yes`，则基础连接已返回到连接池。If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, the underlying connection is returned back to the connection pool. 但是，如果`Pooling`设置为`false`或`no`，则关闭基础连接到服务器。On the other hand, if `Pooling` is set to `false` or `no`, the underlying connection to the server is closed. > [!NOTE] > 从连接池中提取连接或将连接返回到连接池时，服务器上不会引发登录和注销事件，这是因为在将连接返回到连接池时实际上并没有将其关闭。Login and logout events will not be raised on the server when a connection is fetched from or returned to the connection pool, because the connection is not actually closed when it is returned to the connection pool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [SQL Server 连接池 (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md). > [!CAUTION] > 不要调用`Close`或`Dispose`连接、 DataReader 或在任何其他托管的对象上`Finalize`类的方法。Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a Connection, a DataReader, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在终结器中，您应仅释放类直接拥有的非托管的资源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 有关详细信息，请参阅[垃圾回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建，将其打开，显示的某些属性。The following example creates a , opens it, displays some of its properties. 结束时自动关闭连接`using`块。The connection is automatically closed at the end of the `using` block. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.Open Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.Open Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.Open Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.Open Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于参数化查询，SqlClient 往返到 SQL Server 的参数元数据，以查看哪些参数需要加密以及如何 （应使用哪个密钥和算法）。For parameterized queries, SqlClient makes a roundtrip to SQL Server for parameter metadata, to see which parameter it needs to encrypt and how (which keys and algorithms should be used). 如果应用程序将多次调用相同的查询，一个额外往返生成指向服务器的每个时间，这会降低应用程序性能。If the application calls the same query multiple times, an extra roundtrip is made to the server each time, which degrades application performance. 与**ColumnEncryptionQueryMetadataCacheEnabled**设置为 true，如果多次调用相同的查询，往返服务器都能一次。With **ColumnEncryptionQueryMetadataCacheEnabled** set to true, if the same query is called multiple times, the roundtrip to the server will be made only once. 缓存有设置为 2000年： 查询一个非可配置的最大大小参数。The cache has a non-configurable Max size parameter that is set to 2000 queries.

summary.span: 此属性针对安全攻击提供附加保护，这些安全攻击涉及提供伪造密钥路径的受威胁的 SQL Server，可能导致密钥存储凭据泄露。

span.span: This property provides additional protection against security attacks that involve a compromised SQL Server providing fake key paths, which may lead to leaking key store credentials.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于打开 SQL Server 数据库的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string used to open a SQL Server database.

value.span: 连接字符串，其中包含源数据库名称和建立初始连接所需的其他参数。

span.span: The connection string that includes the source database name, and other parameters needed to establish the initial connection.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类似于的 OLE DB 连接字符串，但并不完全相同。The is similar to an OLE DB connection string, but is not identical. 不同于 OLE DB 或 ADO，则返回的连接字符串是与用户设置相同，如果 Persist Security Info 值设置为安全信息减去`false`（默认值）。Unlike OLE DB or ADO, the connection string that is returned is the same as the user-set , minus security information if the Persist Security Info value is set to `false` (default). SQL Server 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序不会持久保存或连接字符串中返回密码，除非将持久性安全信息设置为`true`。The .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server does not persist or return the password in a connection string unless you set Persist Security Info to `true`. 可以使用属性，以连接到数据库。You can use the property to connect to a database. 下面的示例说明了典型的连接字符串。The following example illustrates a typical connection string. ``` "Persist Security Info=False;Integrated Security=true;Initial Catalog=Northwind;server=(local)" ``` 使用新在运行时构造有效的连接字符串。Use the new to construct valid connection strings at run time. 有关详细信息，请参阅[连接字符串生成器](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md)。For more information, see [Connection String Builders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md). 仅当连接关闭时，可以设置属性。The property can be set only when the connection is closed. 许多连接字符串值都有相应的只读属性。Many of the connection string values have corresponding read-only properties. 设置连接字符串时，会更新这些属性，除非检测到错误。When the connection string is set, these properties are updated, except when an error is detected. 在这种情况下，不会更新任何属性。In this case, none of the properties are updated. 属性返回中包含的那些设置。 properties return only those settings that are contained in the . 若要连接到本地计算机，请指定"(local)"的服务器。To connect to a local computer, specify "(local)" for the server. 如果未指定服务器名称，将尝试连接到本地计算机上的默认实例。If a server name is not specified, a connection will be attempted to the default instance on the local computer. 重置关闭的连接将重置所有连接字符串值 （和相关的属性） 包括密码。Resetting the on a closed connection resets all connection string values (and related properties) including the password. 例如，如果设置包含的连接字符串"数据库 = AdventureWorks"，然后重置的连接字符串"数据源 = myserver; 集成的安全性 = true"，则属性不再设置为"AdventureWorks"。For example, if you set a connection string that includes "Database= AdventureWorks", and then reset the connection string to "Data Source=myserver;Integrated Security=true", the property is no longer set to "AdventureWorks". 在设置之后立即分析连接字符串。The connection string is parsed immediately after being set. 如果在分析时，运行时异常，如发现语法错误，生成。If errors in syntax are found when parsing, a runtime exception, such as , is generated. 仅当尝试打开连接时，可以发现其他错误。Other errors can be found only when an attempt is made to open the connection. 连接字符串的基本格式包含一系列的关键字/值对之间用分号分隔。The basic format of a connection string includes a series of keyword/value pairs separated by semicolons. 每个关键字和它的值之间用等号 (=) 连接。The equal sign (=) connects each keyword and its value. 若要包含的值包含分号、 单引号字符或双引号字符，则该值必须括在双引号。To include values that contain a semicolon, single-quote character, or double-quote character, the value must be enclosed in double quotation marks. 如果值包含分号和双引号字符，则该值可以用单引号引起来。If the value contains both a semicolon and a double-quote character, the value can be enclosed in single quotation marks. 单引号还是双引号字符开头的值的情况下很有用。The single quotation mark is also useful if the value starts with a double-quote character. 相反，如果的值以单引号开头，则可以使用双引号。Conversely, the double quotation mark can be used if the value starts with a single quotation mark. 如果值包含单引号和双引号字符，用于将值括起来的引号字符必须成对每次它发生时的值中出现。If the value contains both single-quote and double-quote characters, the quotation mark character used to enclose the value must be doubled every time it occurs within the value. 中的字符串值包含前导或尾随空格，则该值必须括在单引号或双引号引起来。To include preceding or trailing spaces in the string value, the value must be enclosed in either single quotation marks or double quotation marks. 周围的整数、 布尔值或枚举的值的任何前导或尾随空格将被忽略，即使用引号括起来。Any leading or trailing spaces around integer, Boolean, or enumerated values are ignored, even if enclosed in quotation marks. 但是，会保留空格的字符串字面常数关键字或值中。However, spaces within a string literal keyword or value are preserved. 而不使用分隔符，可能的连接字符串中使用单引号或双引号括起来 (例如，数据源 = my'Server 或数据源 = 我的"服务器)，除非引号字符是值中的第一个或最后一个字符。Single or double quotation marks may be used within a connection string without using delimiters (for example, Data Source= my'Server or Data Source= my"Server), unless a quotation mark character is the first or last character in the value. 关键字不区分大小写。Keywords are not case sensitive. 下表列出了中的关键字值的有效名称。The following table lists the valid names for keyword values within the . |关键字Keyword|默认Default|描述Description| |-------------|-------------|-----------------| |AddrAddr|不可用N/A|同义词**数据源**。Synonym of **Data Source**.| |AddressAddress|不可用N/A|同义词**数据源**。Synonym of **Data Source**.| |应用App|不可用N/A|同义词**应用程序名称**。Synonym of **Application Name**.| |Application NameApplication Name|不可用N/A|应用程序或.NET SQLClient 数据提供程序如果未不提供任何应用程序名称的名称。The name of the application, or '.NET SQLClient Data Provider' if no application name is provided.

应用程序名称可以是 128 个字符或更少。An application name can be 128 characters or less.| |`ApplicationIntent`|`ReadWrite`|连接到服务器时声明应用程序工作负荷类型。Declares the application workload type when connecting to a server. 可能的值为 `ReadOnly` 和 `ReadWrite`。Possible values are `ReadOnly` and `ReadWrite`. 例如:For example:

`ApplicationIntent=ReadOnly`

有关对 Always On 可用性组的 SqlClient 支持的详细信息，请参阅[对高可用性、灾难恢复的 SqlClient 支持](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sqlclient-support-for-high-availability-disaster-recovery.md)。For more information about SqlClient support for Always On Availability Groups, see [SqlClient Support for High Availability, Disaster Recovery](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sqlclient-support-for-high-availability-disaster-recovery.md).| |Asynchronous ProcessingAsynchronous Processing

或-or-

AsyncAsync|false'false'|当`true`，支持异步操作。When `true`, enables asynchronous operation support. 已识别的值为 `true`、`false`、`yes` 和 `no`。Recognized values are `true`, `false`, `yes`, and `no`.

在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 开始时，忽略此属性。This property is ignored beginning in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. 有关 SqlClient 支持异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about SqlClient support for asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).| |AttachDBFilenameAttachDBFilename

扩展属性Extended Properties

或-or-

初始文件名Initial File Name|不可用N/A|包括可附加数据库的完整路径名称的主数据库文件的名称。The name of the primary database file, including the full path name of an attachable database. AttachDBFilename 只能用于扩展名为.mdf 的主数据文件。AttachDBFilename is only supported for primary data files with an .mdf extension.

如果在连接字符串中指定 AttachDBFileName 关键字的值，则数据库连接，并成为连接的默认数据库。If the value of the AttachDBFileName key is specified in the connection string, the database is attached and becomes the default database for the connection.

如果未指定此密钥，并且以前附加该数据库，将不会重新附加数据库。If this key is not specified and if the database was previously attached, the database will not be reattached. 在以前附加的数据库将用作该连接的默认数据库。The previously attached database will be used as the default database for the connection.

如果 AttachDBFileName 关键字以及指定此密钥，则此项的值将用作别名。If this key is specified together with the AttachDBFileName key, the value of this key will be used as the alias. 但是，如果已在另一个附加的数据库中使用该名称，则连接将失败。However, if the name is already used in another attached database, the connection will fail.

路径可能是绝对或相对使用 DataDirectory 替代字符串。The path may be absolute or relative by using the DataDirectory substitution string. 如果使用 DataDirectory，则数据库文件必须存在的替换字符串指向的目录的子目录中。If DataDirectory is used, the database file must exist within a subdirectory of the directory pointed to by the substitution string. **注意：** 远程服务器、 HTTP 和 UNC 路径名称中不受支持。**Note:** Remote server, HTTP, and UNC path names are not supported.

必须使用关键字 database （或其别名之一） 指定数据库名称，如以下所示：The database name must be specified with the keyword 'database' (or one of its aliases) as in the following:

"AttachDbFileName=|DataDirectory|\data\YourDB.mdf;integrated security=true;database=YourDatabase"

如果日志文件和数据文件存在于同一个目录中，并且在附加主数据文件时使用“database”关键字，则将生成错误。An error will be generated if a log file exists in the same directory as the data file and the 'database' keyword is used when attaching the primary data file. 在这种情况下，请移除日志文件。In this case, remove the log file. 附加数据库后，将基于物理路径自动生成一个新日志文件。Once the database is attached, a new log file will be automatically generated based on the physical path.| |身份验证Authentication|不可用N/A|用于身份验证方法[连接到 SQL 数据库使用 Azure Active Directory 身份验证](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/sql-database-aad-authentication/#7-connect-to-your-database-by-using-azure-active-directory-identities)。The authentication method used for [Connecting to SQL Database By Using Azure Active Directory Authentication](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/sql-database-aad-authentication/#7-connect-to-your-database-by-using-azure-active-directory-identities).

有效值为：Valid values are:

Active Directory 集成、 Active Directory 密码，Sql 密码。Active Directory Integrated, Active Directory Password, Sql Password.| |列加密设置Column Encryption Setting|不可用N/A|启用或禁用[Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine?view=sql-server-2017)连接的功能。Enables or disables [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine?view=sql-server-2017) functionality for the connection.| |连接超时值Connect Timeout

或-or-

Connection TimeoutConnection Timeout

或-or-

超时Timeout|1515|长度 （以秒为单位） 的时间来等待终止尝试并生成错误之前连接到服务器。The length of time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to the server before terminating the attempt and generating an error.

有效值为大于或等于 0 且小于或等于 2147483647。Valid values are greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 2147483647.

打开连接到 Azure SQL 数据库时，设置连接超时为 30 秒。When opening a connection to a Azure SQL Database, set the connection timeout to 30 seconds.| |连接生存期Connection Lifetime

或-or-

Load Balance TimeoutLoad Balance Timeout|00|连接返回到池中后，创建时间将与当前时间进行比较，如果时间跨度（秒）超过 `Connection Lifetime` 指定的值，该连接将被破坏。When a connection is returned to the pool, its creation time is compared with the current time, and the connection is destroyed if that time span (in seconds) exceeds the value specified by `Connection Lifetime`. 在聚集配置中可以使用它来强制在运行服务器和刚联机的服务器之间达到负载平衡。This is useful in clustered configurations to force load balancing between a running server and a server just brought online.

值为零 (0) 会导致池的连接具有的最大连接超时值。A value of zero (0) causes pooled connections to have the maximum connection timeout.| |ConnectRetryCountConnectRetryCount|11|控件在客户端标识空闲连接失败后尝试重新连接的次数。Controls the number of reconnection attempts after the client identifies an idle connection failure. 有效值为 0 到 255。Valid values are 0 to 255. 默认值为 1。The default is 1. 0 表示不尝试重新连接 （禁用连接复原）。0 means do not attempt to reconnect (disable connection resiliency).

有关空闲连接复原的其他信息，请参阅[技术文章 – 空闲连接复原](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=393996)。For additional information about idle connection resiliency, see [Technical Article – Idle Connection Resiliency](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=393996).| |ConnectRetryIntervalConnectRetryInterval|1010|指定每次连接重试尝试 (ConnectRetryCount) 之间的时间。Specifies the time between each connection retry attempt (ConnectRetryCount). 有效值为 1 到 60 秒 (默认值 = 10)，应用后第一次重新连接尝试。Valid values are 1 to 60 seconds (default=10), applied after the first reconnection attempt. 检测到断开的连接时，客户端立即尝试重新连接;这是第一次重新连接尝试，仅当 ConnectRetryCount 大于 0。When a broken connection is detected, the client immediately attempts to reconnect; this is the first reconnection attempt and only occurs if ConnectRetryCount is greater than 0. 如果第一次重新连接尝试失败并且 ConnectRetryCount 大于 1，客户端将等待 ConnectRetryInterval 尝试第二个和后续的重新连接尝试。If the first reconnection attempt fails and ConnectRetryCount is greater than 1, the client waits ConnectRetryInterval to try the second and subsequent reconnection attempts.

有关空闲连接复原的其他信息，请参阅[技术文章 – 空闲连接复原](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=393996)。For additional information about idle connection resiliency, see [Technical Article – Idle Connection Resiliency](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=393996).| |Context ConnectionContext Connection|false'false'|`true` 如果应建立到 SQL Server 进程内连接。`true` if an in-process connection to SQL Server should be made.| |Current LanguageCurrent Language

语言Language|不可用N/A|设置数据库服务器的警告或错误消息所使用的语言。Sets the language used for database server warning or error messages.

语言名称可以是 128 个字符或更少。The language name can be 128 characters or less.| |“数据源”Data Source

网络地址Network Address|不可用N/A|要连接到 SQL server 实例的名称或网络地址。The name or network address of the instance of SQL Server to which to connect. 可以在服务器名之后指定的端口号：The port number can be specified after the server name:

`server=tcp:servername, portnumber`

在指定的本地实例时，始终使用 (local)。When specifying a local instance, always use (local). 若要强制使用某个协议，添加以下前缀之一：To force a protocol, add one of the following prefixes:

`np:(local), tcp:(local), lpc:(local)`

从[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，您还可以连接到 LocalDB 数据库，如下所示：Beginning in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can also connect to a LocalDB database as follows:

`server=(localdb)\\myInstance`

有关 LocalDB 的详细信息，请参阅[SqlClient 对 LocalDB 的支持](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sqlclient-support-for-localdb.md)。For more information about LocalDB, see [SqlClient Support for LocalDB](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sqlclient-support-for-localdb.md).

**数据源**必须使用 TCP 格式或 Named Pipes 格式。**Data Source** must use the TCP format or the Named Pipes format.

TCP 格式如下所示：TCP format is as follows:

-tcp:\<主机名 >\\< 实例名称\>- tcp:\\\
-tcp:\<主机名称 >，\- tcp:\,\

必须以前缀开头的 TCP 格式"tcp:"且后跟数据库实例中指定的主机名和实例名称。The TCP format must start with the prefix "tcp:" and is followed by the database instance, as specified by a host name and an instance name. 连接到 Azure SQL 数据库时，此格式不适用。This format is not applicable when connecting to Azure SQL Database. 不指定任何协议时，自动选择将 TCP 连接到 Azure SQL 数据库的连接。TCP is automatically selected for connections to Azure SQL Database when no protocol is specified.

必须通过以下方式之一中指定的主机名：The host name MUST be specified in one of the following ways:

-NetBIOSName- NetBIOSName
-IPv4Address- IPv4Address
-IPv6Address- IPv6Address

实例名称用于解析为托管数据库实例的特定 TCP/IP 端口号。The instance name is used to resolve to a particular TCP/IP port number on which a database instance is hosted. 或者，还允许直接指定 TCP/IP 端口号。Alternatively, specifying a TCP/IP port number directly is also allowed. 如果两个实例名称和端口号不存在，则使用默认数据库实例。If both instance name and port number are not present, the default database instance is used.

Named Pipes 格式如下所示：The Named Pipes format is as follows:

-np:\\\\< 主机名\>\pipe\\< 管道名称\>- np:\\\\\pipe\\

必须以前缀开头的命名管道格式"np:"且后跟一个命名的管道名称。The Named Pipes format MUST start with the prefix "np:" and is followed by a named pipe name.

必须通过以下方式之一中指定的主机名：The host name MUST be specified in one of the following ways:

-NetBIOSName- NetBIOSName
-IPv4Address- IPv4Address
-IPv6Address- IPv6Address

管道名称用于标识.NET Framework 应用程序将连接到的数据库实例。The pipe name is used to identify the database instance to which the .NET Framework application will be connected.

如果的值**网络**指定键，则前缀"tcp:"和"np:"不应指定。If the value of the **Network** key is specified, the prefixes "tcp:" and "np:" should not be specified. **注意：** 可以强制使用 TCP 而不是共享内存，或者由前缀**tcp:** 到在连接字符串，或使用的服务器名称**localhost**。**Note:** You can force the use of TCP instead of shared memory, either by prefixing **tcp:** to the server name in the connection string, or by using **localhost**.| |EncryptEncrypt|false'false'|当`true`，SQL Server 的服务器是否安装了证书，客户端和服务器之间发送的所有数据使用 SSL 加密。When `true`, SQL Server uses SSL encryption for all data sent between the client and server if the server has a certificate installed. 已识别的值为 `true`、`false`、`yes` 和 `no`。Recognized values are `true`, `false`, `yes`, and `no`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[连接字符串语法](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-syntax.md)。For more information, see [Connection String Syntax](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-syntax.md).

从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，当`TrustServerCertificate`为 false 和`Encrypt`为 true，连接字符串中指定的服务器名称 （或 IP 地址），SQL Server SSL 证书中的服务器名称 （或 IP 地址） 必须完全匹配。Beginning in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], when `TrustServerCertificate` is false and `Encrypt` is true, the server name (or IP address) in a SQL Server SSL certificate must exactly match the server name (or IP address) specified in the connection string. 否则，连接尝试将失败。Otherwise, the connection attempt will fail. 有关对其使用者启动带通配符 （\*） 的证书的支持信息，请参阅[接受通配符服务器证书用于服务器身份验证](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/258858)。For information about support for certificates whose subject starts with a wildcard character (\*), see [Accepted wildcards used by server certificates for server authentication](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/258858).| |EnlistEnlist|'true''true'|`true` 指示 SQL Server 连接池进程会自动登记在创建线程的当前事务上下文中的连接。`true` indicates that the SQL Server connection pooler automatically enlists the connection in the creation thread's current transaction context.| |Failover PartnerFailover Partner|不可用N/A|数据库镜像配置故障转移合作伙伴服务器的名称。The name of the failover partner server where database mirroring is configured.

如果此密钥的值为""，然后**Initial Catalog**必须存在，且其值不能""。If the value of this key is "", then **Initial Catalog** must be present, and its value must not be "".

服务器名称可为 128 个字符或更少。The server name can be 128 characters or less.

如果指定故障转移合作伙伴，但故障转移伙伴服务器未配置为数据库镜像和 （使用 Server 关键字指定） 的主服务器不可用，则连接将失败。If you specify a failover partner but the failover partner server is not configured for database mirroring and the primary server (specified with the Server keyword) is not available, then the connection will fail.

如果指定故障转移伙伴和主服务器未配置为数据库镜像，与主服务器 （使用 Server 关键字指定） 的连接会成功，如果主服务器不可用。If you specify a failover partner and the primary server is not configured for database mirroring, the connection to the primary server (specified with the Server keyword) will succeed if the primary server is available.| |Initial CatalogInitial Catalog

数据库Database|不可用N/A|数据库的名称。The name of the database.

数据库名称可以是 128 个字符或更少。The database name can be 128 characters or less.| |Integrated SecurityIntegrated Security

或-or-

Trusted_ConnectionTrusted_Connection|false'false'|当`false`，在连接中指定用户 ID 和密码。When `false`, User ID and Password are specified in the connection. 当`true`，使用当前 Windows 帐户凭据进行身份验证。When `true`, the current Windows account credentials are used for authentication.

可识别的值为`true`， `false`， `yes`， `no`，并`sspi`（强烈推荐），这等同于`true`。Recognized values are `true`, `false`, `yes`, `no`, and `sspi` (strongly recommended), which is equivalent to `true`.

隐式取消绑定可使连接与事务结束时分离。Implicit Unbind causes the connection to detach from the transaction when it ends. 分离后，在自动模式下对连接执行其他请求。After detaching, additional requests on the connection are performed in autocommit mode. 在事务处于活动状态的情况下，执行请求时不会检查 `System.Transactions.Transaction.Current` 属性。The `System.Transactions.Transaction.Current` property is not checked when executing requests while the transaction is active. 事务结束后，会在自动提交模式下执行其他请求。After the transaction has ended, additional requests are performed in autocommit mode.

显式取消绑定会导致连接一直附加到之前连接关闭的事务或显式`SqlConnection.TransactionEnlist(null)`调用。Explicit Unbind causes the connection to remain attached to the transaction until the connection is closed or an explicit `SqlConnection.TransactionEnlist(null)` is called. 从[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，更改到隐式取消绑定使显式取消绑定已过时。Beginning in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], changes to Implicit Unbind make Explicit Unbind obsolete. 如果 `InvalidOperationException` 不是登记事务或者登记事务未处于活动状态，则将引发 `Transaction.Current`。An `InvalidOperationException` is thrown if `Transaction.Current` is not the enlisted transaction or if the enlisted transaction is not active.| |TransparentNetworkIPResolutionTransparentNetworkIPResolution|请参阅说明。See description.|将该键的值设置为 `true` 时，需要应用程序检索特定 DNS 条目的所有 IP 地址并尝试连接到列表中的第一个地址。When the value of this key is set to `true`, the application is required to retrieve all IP addresses for a particular DNS entry and attempt to connect with the first one in the list. 如果未在 0.5 秒内建立连接，应用程序将尝试并行连接到所有其他地址。If the connection is not established within 0.5 seconds, the application will try to connect to all others in parallel. 第一个地址响应后，应用程序将与响应的 IP 地址建立连接。When the first answers, the application will establish the connection with the respondent IP address.

如果`MultiSubnetFailover`键设置为`true`，`TransparentNetworkIPResolution`将被忽略。If the `MultiSubnetFailover` key is set to `true`, `TransparentNetworkIPResolution` is ignored.

summary.span: 在指定的事务中登记为分布式事务。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用方法在分布式事务中登记。You can use the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因为登记中的连接实例， **EnlistTransaction**利用中提供的功能用于管理命名空间的分布式事务，使其优于**EnlistDistributedTransaction**实现此目的。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction** for this purpose. 有关详细信息，请参阅[分布式事务](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md). 你可以继续在现有使用分布式的事务中登记**EnlistDistributedTransaction**方法如果禁用自动登记。You can continue to enlist in an existing distributed transaction using the **EnlistDistributedTransaction** method if auto-enlistment is disabled. 在现有分布式事务中登记可以确保，提交或回滚事务，如果数据源的代码所做的修改也提交或回滚。Enlisting in an existing distributed transaction makes sure that, if the transaction is committed or rolled back, modifications made by the code at the data source are also committed or rolled back. `EnlistDistributedTransaction` 如果返回的异常已经启动了事务使用。`EnlistDistributedTransaction` returns an exception if the has already started a transaction using . 但是，如果该事务是在数据源启动的本地事务 (例如，通过显式执行 BEGIN TRANSACTION 语句使用对象)， **EnlistDistributedTransaction**回滚本地事务并根据请求在现有分布式事务中登记。However, if the transaction is a local transaction started at the data source (for example, by explicitly executing the BEGIN TRANSACTION statement using an object), **EnlistDistributedTransaction** rolls back the local transaction and enlists in the existing distributed transaction as requested. 您不会收到通知，本地事务已回滚，并且负责不管理任何本地事务使用。You do not receive notice that the local transaction was rolled back, and are responsible for managing any local transactions not started using .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用方法在分布式事务中登记。You can use the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因为登记中的连接实例， **EnlistTransaction**利用中提供的功能用于管理命名空间的分布式事务，使其优于**EnlistDistributedTransaction**，使用该**System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction**对象。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction**, which uses a **System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction** object. 它还具有略有不同的语义： 后显式事务上登记连接，不能取消登记或第一个事务完成之前在另一个事务中登记。It also has slightly different semantics: once a connection is explicitly enlisted on a transaction, it cannot be unenlisted or enlisted in another transaction until the first transaction finishes. 有关分布式事务的详细信息，请参阅[分布式事务](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information about distributed transactions, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您将设置到`true`，则以前视为作为现在处理异常的错误事件。When you set to `true`, errors that were previously treated as exceptions are now handled as events. 所有事件立即激发和事件处理程序处理。All events fire immediately and are handled by the event handler. 如果是设置为`false`，然后过程结束时处理事件。If is is set to `false`, then events are handled at the end of the procedure. > [!NOTE] > 会导致服务器停止处理命令的错误严重级别为 17 或更高版本需要作为异常进行处理。An error with a severity level of 17 or above that causes the server to stop processing the command needs to be handled as an exception. 在这种情况下，无论如何在 事件中处理该错误，都会引发异常。In this case, an exception is thrown regardless of how the error is handled in the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[连接事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md)。For more information on working with events, see [Connection Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md). SQL Server 引擎生成的错误的详细信息，请参阅[数据库引擎错误](/sql/relational-databases/errors-events/database-engine-events-and-errors)。For more information on errors generated by the SQL Server engine, see [Database Engine Errors](/sql/relational-databases/errors-events/database-engine-events-and-errors).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `restrictionValues`参数可以提供*n*深度的值，指定的特定集合的限制集合。The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply *n* depth of values, which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection. 为了将值设置给定的限制，并且未设置其他限制的值，您需要将前面的限制条件设置为`null`然后将为你想要为指定值的限制中的相应值。In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you need to set the preceding restrictions to `null` and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for. 此示例是"表"集合。An example of this is the "Tables" collection. 如果"Tables"集合具有三个限制-数据库、 所有者和表名称--和你想要返回仅具有所有者"Carl"相关联的表，则需要传递以下值： null、"Carl"。If the "Tables" collection has three restrictions--database, owner, and table name--and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl", you need to pass in the following values: null, "Carl". 如果未传入限制值，默认值用于该限制。If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction. 这是相同的映射与传入`null`，这是传入空字符串作为参数值不同。This is the same mapping as passing in `null`, which is different from passing in an empty string for the parameter value. 在这种情况下，空字符串 ("") 被视为可指定参数的值。In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter. 有关代码示例演示，请参阅。For a code sample demonstrating , see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要处理警告或信息性消息，由服务器发送客户端应创建委托来侦听此事件。Clients that want to process warnings or informational messages sent by the server should create an delegate to listen to this event. 事件发生时在严重级别为 10 的消息或小于返回由 SQL Server。The event occurs when a message with a severity of 10 or less is returned by SQL Server. 严重级别介于 11 到 20 之间的消息引发错误和严重级别高于 20 会导致连接断开的消息。Messages that have a severity between 11 and 20 raise an error and messages that have a severity over 20 causes the connection to close. SQL Server 错误级别的详细信息，请参阅[数据库引擎错误严重性](/sql/relational-databases/errors-events/database-engine-error-severities)。For more information on SQL Server error levels, see [Database Engine Error Severities](/sql/relational-databases/errors-events/database-engine-error-severities). 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[连接事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md)。For more information and an example, see [Connection Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绘制从连接池中的打开的连接，如果有可用。The draws an open connection from the connection pool if one is available. 否则，它在建立与 SQL Server 实例的新连接。Otherwise, it establishes a new connection to an instance of SQL Server. > [!NOTE] > 如果超出范围，它没有闭合。If the goes out of scope, it is not closed. 因此，必须显式关闭连接通过调用。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling . > [!NOTE] > 如果指定时要连接到 SQL Server 和使用以外，在 TCP/IP 协议的实例的 1433年以外的端口号方法失败。If you specify a port number other than 1433 when you are trying to connect to an instance of SQL Server and using a protocol other than TCP/IP, the method fails. 若要指定端口号 1433年以外，包括"server = machinename，端口号"中的连接字符串和使用 TCP/IP 协议。To specify a port number other than 1433, include "server=machinename,port number" in the connection string, and use the TCP/IP protocol. > [!NOTE] > SQL Server 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序需要"允许对非托管程序集调用"已启用的安全权限 (与设置为`UnmanagedCode`) 以打开启用 SQL 调试。The .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server requires the Security permission with "Allows calls to unmanaged assemblies" enabled ( with set to `UnmanagedCode`) to open a with SQL Debugging enabled. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，将打开，并显示它的一些属性。The following example creates a , opens it, and displays some of its properties. 结束时自动关闭连接`using`块。The connection is automatically closed at the end of the `using` block. summary.span: 获取用于与 SQL Server 的实例进行通信的网络数据包的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets the size (in bytes) of network packets used to communicate with an instance of SQL Server.

value.span: 网络数据包的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size (in bytes) of network packets.

value.span: 默认值为 8000。

span.span: The default value is 8000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序执行大容量复制操作或发送或接收大量文本或图像数据，数据包大小大于默认值可以提高效率，因为它会导致减少网络读取和写入操作。If an application performs bulk copy operations, or sends or receives lots of text or image data, a packet size larger than the default may improve efficiency because it causes fewer network read and write operations. 如果应用程序发送和接收的少量信息，您可以数据包大小设置为 512 个字节 (使用中的数据包大小值)，即足以进行多数数据传输操作。If an application sends and receives small amounts of information, you can set the packet size to 512 bytes (using the Packet Size value in the ), which is sufficient for most data transfer operations. 对于大多数应用程序，默认数据包大小是最佳的。For most applications, the default packet size is best. 可能的 512 和 32767 之间的字节范围中的值。 may be a value in the range of 512 and 32767 bytes. 如果值超出此范围生成异常。An exception is generated if the value is outside this range. 将默认值设置为一个数字大于 8000 将导致数据包，而不是减少 SQL Server 的整体可伸缩性的高效得多 SinglePage 分配器的 SQL Server 实例上使用多页分配器。Setting the default value to a number greater than 8000 will cause the packets to use the MultiPage allocator on the instance of SQL Server instead of the much more efficient SinglePage allocator, reducing the overall scalability of the SQL Server. SQL Server 如何使用内存的详细信息，请参阅[内存管理体系结构指南](/sql/relational-databases/memory-management-architecture-guide)。For more information on how SQL Server uses memory, see [Memory Management Architecture Guide](/sql/relational-databases/memory-management-architecture-guide). ## Examples 下面的示例创建，其中包括设置`Packet Size`为 512 中的连接字符串。The following example creates a , including setting the `Packet Size` to 512 in the connection string. 它将显示和控制台窗口中的属性。It displays the and properties in the console window. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.PacketSize Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.PacketSize Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.PacketSize Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.PacketSize Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
